title: Associate, Clinical Data Management in Part-Time (m/f) - MED-EL Medical Electronics
subtitle: Innsbruck, T 6020
body:
MED-EL is a leading manufacturer of innovative medical devices for the treatment of various types and degrees of hearing loss. Our unique portfolio of implantable hearing solutions benefits thousands of individuals in more than 100 countries worldwide. With headquarters in Innsbruck, Austria, MED-EL has over 2200 employees around the world. In support of our continuing growth, we currently have an open position with focus on:
Apply online

Associate, Clinical Data
Management in Part-Time
(m/f)

CRD_1_2001
Innsbruck, Austria


Main Tasks

  • Create databases to comply with IT Software SOPs and regulatory requirements
  • Perform, review and validate data for Clinical Research
  • Prepare data management plans and reports

 

Requirements

  • Completed higher education
  • Ideally experience in data management in the field of medical devices
  • Database management knowledge with Excel, Filemaker, Access or similar
  • Basic knowledge in eCRF programs and data management systems is a plus
  • Fluent in English and German
  • Desired weekly working hours: 20-25 hours

 

 

Please apply in English!


Salary will be determined based on professional experience; the formal minimum salary according to Collective Bargaining Agreement is EUR 29,513.26 (full time 38.5 hours/week).


We offer a challenging opportunity in a multinational work environment with English as our company language. We look forward to receiving your application at jobs.medel.com

 

 

Apply online

MED-EL Medical Electronics

Headquarters
Fürstenweg 77a
6020 Innsbruck,
Austria
